edu.luc.etl.cs313.android.simplestopwatch.test.model.clock

Class AbstractClockModelTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.luc.etl.cs313.android.simplestopwatch.test.model.clock.AbstractClockModelTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultClockModelTest

    public abstract class AbstractClockModelTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test case superclass for the autonomous clock model abstraction. Unit-tests the pseudo-real-time behavior of the clock. Uses a simple stub object to satisfy the clock's dependency.

      void testRunning()
      Verifies that a running clock emits about one tick event per second.

      Verifies that a stopped clock does not emit any tick events.
